data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Eastern Highlands, Papua New Guinea.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Eastern Highlands, Papua New Guinea

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Eastern Highlands, Papua New Guinea so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 133,309 believers in Eastern Highlands, Papua New Guinea a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, move the 133,309 believers in the state of Eastern Highlands to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Eastern Highlands, Papua New Guinea.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Eastern Highlands. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.section_summary:
the state of Eastern Highlands, Papua New Guinea has a population of 579,800.

We estimate Eastern Highlands has 133,309 people who might know Jesus, 413,908 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 32,583 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Eastern Highlands, Papua New Guinea to the gospel today.

location.name: Eastern Highlands
location.people_groups_list: Waibuk, Bemal, Mari, Hop, Pulabu, Magi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Waibuk (3,400), Bemal (3,000), Mari, Hop (1,400), Pulabu (300), Magi (60)
